item.title: An organizer's lessons on meet-ups and growing a community
item.description: Here are some of the lessons I learnt. Core skills and codependency The focus on core/beginner skills in the data science field gave me a great starting advantage of nurturing participants from day one and later it became easy to introduce other much harder skills like machine learning.
